title: "Alibaba-Backed AI Startup Megvii Revives Shanghai IPO Dreams"
excerpt: "Ant Group and Taobao China Holding, two affiliates of e-commerce giant Alibaba Group Holding, hold a combined 29.4 percent stake in Megvii, according to the prospectus. But founders Yin Qi, Tang Wenbin, and Yang Mu are the de facto controllers even though they own a total of 16.8 percent of Megvii's equity."
